taxonConcepts.nameAccordingTo: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: April 2013

taxonConcepts.scientificName: Lepidocephalus thermalis (Valenciennes in Cuvier and Valenciennes, 1846)
Lepidocephalus thermalis (Valenciennes in Cuvier and Valenciennes, 1846)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Miscellaneous Details
dataObjects.description: "Taxonomic Notes: Described as Cobitis thermalis by Valenciennes 1846 from the hot waters of Cania, Sri Lanka."

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Brief
dataObjects.description: "Red List Category & Criteria: Least Concern ver 3.1 Year Assessed: 2010  Conservation Actions: Currently there is no specific action plan directed towards Ambassis dussumieri. Research on the population status, ecology and threats to the species is essential."

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Found usually in quiet, flowing waters with a sandy substrate.  Feeds mainly on detritus, but also algae (Ref. 6028).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.title: Distribution
dataObjects.description: "Range Description: Lepidocephalus guntea is present in Sri Lanka and throughout much of the Western Ghats of India. Countries - Native: India (Karnataka, Kerala, Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu); Sri Lanka"

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.references: Talwar, P.K. and A.G. Jhingran 1991 Inland fishes of India and adjacent countries. vol 1. A.A. Balkema, Rotterdam. 541 p. (Ref. 4832)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Size
dataObjects.title: Max. size
dataObjects.references: Talwar, P.K. and A.G. Jhingran 1991 Inland fishes of India and adjacent countries. vol 1. A.A. Balkema, Rotterdam. 541 p. (Ref. 4832)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: demersal; freshwater; pH range: 6.5 - 7.0; dH range: 5

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Uses
dataObjects.title: Importance
dataObjects.description: fisheries: of no interest; aquarium: commercial
